title: TikTok Viral Challenge Finder
description: Find exploding TikTok challenges & viral hashtags before they peak. Real-time views + virality score. Perfect for creators & marketers.

niche.title: Niche / Keyword
niche.description: Keyword or topic to search for trending challenges (e.g., 'dance', 'fitness', 'food'). Leave empty for global trending.

minViews.title: Minimum estimated views (7 days)
minViews.description: Filter challenges by minimum estimated views in the last 7 days (e.g., 250000 for 250K+ views).

maxResults.title: Max challenges to return
maxResults.description: Maximum number of top challenges to return (5-30).
